Program_Info.Program_OS_Support: WinVista,WinVista x64,Win7 x32,Win7 x64,Win8 x32,Win8 x64,Win10 x32,Win10 x64,Win Other
Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: Complete rebuild and enhancement of all features and functions with new wallpaper.
Program_Info.Program_System_Requirements: Windows, MacOS, iOS, ChromeOS, Android, with 1024x768 Display Size

English.Char_Desc_80: Cross-platform browser based professional office suite.
English.Char_Desc_250: With its online and offline capabilities, you don't need to install any software. Use the built-in capabilities of your HTML5 web browser for such things as spell checking, print, print preview, and find functions.
English.Char_Desc_450: With its online and offline capabilities, you don't need to install any software. Use the built-in capabilities of your HTML5 web browser for such things as spell checking, print, print preview, and find functions. All online text editors and word processors are hidden behind login prompts and firewalls with the option of paying for more options and features. Our web based applications are not this restrictive and are completely free.
English.Char_Desc_2000:
An office suite right in your own web browser. This makes it the smallest office suite in the world. No installation or download necessary. Just open the html document, and have direct access to your own professional productivity software. Included is a small text editor, professional word processor, and a spreadsheet application. Various document templates are available for the spreadsheet application.
This makes our web applications a very green option to use! The html document format is absolutely cross-platform compatible and only needs a web browser to open. This will bring the end to proprietary document formats and special and expensive software necessary to open, edit, and save all your precious letters, memos, and all other types of documents.
With its online and offline capabilities, you don't need to install any software. Use the built-in capabilities of your HTML5 web browser for such things as spell checking, print, print preview, and find functions.
All online text editors and word processors are hidden behind login prompts and firewalls with the option of paying for more options and features. Our web based applications are not this restrictive and are completely free. We are the first in the world to bring you a complete office suite written and created in pure HTML5 code.(PWA)
https://office.ssuiteoffice.com/
Remember to set the downloads option in your web browser to always ask you where to save your documents. If not, then your documents will be saved to your default downloads folder.
Create stand-alone documents with embedded images from your hard drive without any links! { gif, jpg, png } Drag and drop content directly from open web pages e.g. text, images, or video etc. Create and insert links for dynamic online documents.
Browser for Best Experience and Performance:
- SSuite NetSurfer Browser - All Chromium-based browsers
No Java or DotNet required, Green Energy Software! Saving the planet one bit at a time.
